message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_XRV_INVALID_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date must not be later than Product Evidence Form Link start date "%1d".

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_XRV_PRODEVIDFORMLINK_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than Product Evidence Form Link's end date "%1d".

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_XRV_PRODEVIDFORMLINK_START_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than Product Evidence Form Link's start date "%1d".

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_EVIDENCE_FORM_LINK_XRV_EXISTS
message.locale: This Evidence Form cannot be canceled since there is an existing Product Evidence Form Link.
This Evidence Form cannot be cancelled since there is an existing Product Evidence Form Link.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_XRV_CASE_EVIDENCE_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: This Evidence Form cannot be canceled as it has been used to record evidence.
This Evidence Form cannot be cancelled as it has been used to record evidence.
